bibl.title: Two Further Chronological Notes on Byzantine Documents.
bibl.note: 1. From Σεβαστός to Αὔγουστος: a note on 4th-century imperial titulature. - 2. A note on some invocation documents from Byzantine Egypt dated only by month, day and indiction year.
bibl.seg: WORP K.A., Two Further Chronological Notes on Byzantine Documents.
1. From Σεβαστός to Αὔγουστος: a note on 4th-century imperial titulature. - 2. A note on some invocation documents from Byzantine Egypt dated only by month, day and indiction year.
